body_html:
Hi

I need to install and configure Tensorflow on my Windows-7 32-bit OS through Anaconda 5.3 Python 3.6 version and facing lot of issues. Please let me know steps to follow from scratch (and share if any specific installer I will start the process from scratch)

Thanks
